channel.title: 5 Baby birds abandoned; 1 died
channel.description:
So I recently found that there were 5 baby birds in the nest I bought, and the mother didn't come much, she rarely came. So when she completely stopped, my mom and I took the birds into the house, all went fine until last night. I fed them before I went to sleep, and I had to keep waking up at night to keep feeding them. I thought 2 of them had died, but I was wrong. 1 of the birds was *somehow* attached onto the dead bird with some kind of string that I never gave them. Well, I got that untangled now. It was on his leg and on his neck, he had it on all night although I was being a fucking idiot and thought that the bird was clinging onto the dead bird for respect or something.
He's doing well now, but hes not moving and I think he might have a broken neck. His eyes or open and he's not moving, although I'm pretty sure he's alive. If anyone has any tips for me, PLEASE post!

item.title: 5 Baby birds abandoned; 1 died
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

He's doing well now, but hes not moving and I think he might have a broken neck. His eyes or open and he's not moving, although I'm pretty sure he's alive. If anyone has any tips for me, PLEASE post!

That doesn’t sound well to me…

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Baby birds abandoned; 1 died
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Shake him vigorously, movement will soon follow.

On a serious note, You might as well take that one out of the bunch or you will focus on that one to much and have the other 4 acting just the same.

Also what are you feeding them?

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Baby birds abandoned; 1 died
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:11, topic:289474”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=382646.msg2873890#msg2873890 date=1247940109]

You’re required to chew the food first, then regurgitate it into their mouths. Otherwise, they’re not able to digest it and they will, after a while, all die.

Fuck! Oh well, worth a try.
[/quote]
just blend it in a blender[/quote]

Alright, thanks.

Read full topic
